data.title: IU Locations: About: Indiana University
data.meta_description: See where to find Indiana University campuses across the state and global locations around the world.
data.text:
Beginning with our roots in Bloomington, Indiana, IU is now a major multi-campus university system with locations across the state and the world.

IU campuses

IU's core campuses are IU Bloomington, our oldest and largest campus, and IU Indianapolis, an urban campus in the heart of the state capital.

The statewide IU system includes five additional campuses, two regional centers, and nine School of Medicine campuses across Indiana.
